item.title: About me
item.author: moushegh@gmail.com (Moushegh Nazaretyan)
item.description:

- terraform 
- lxe, docker containers, KVM and ESXi
- Debian/RHEL , CoreOS and DCOS

mostly enjoying working with

- aws 
- digital ocean
- vmware esxi

daily maintaining

- nginx, apache
- mysql, mariadb, monodb, couchDB
- redis, memcached
- jenkins, GoCD
- nagios, munin, grafite, ELK 
- HAProxy, keepalived, lvs
- etc ...
